```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(readr)
```

```{r}
data <- read_csv("insurance.csv") %>% 
  mutate(smoker = as.factor(if_else(smoker == "yes", 1, 0)),
         male = as.factor(if_else(sex == "male", 1, 0)),
         region = as.factor(region)) %>% 
  select(-sex)
head(data)
```
